nodes.text: Surly Sarlacc was an alcoholic beverage served at Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo and at Ronto Roasters in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu. The cocktail was light orange in color, and was made with various fruit flavors. It was suitable for consumption by humans.

The Surly Sarlacc is only served at the Disney's Hollywood Studios versions of Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge in Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo and in Ronto Roasters, which have no alcoholic options in Disneyland. The menu's description reads, "Ketel One Botanical Grapefruit and Rose Vodka, Minute Maid© Limeade, Raspberry, Spicy Mango Flavors."
